title: Preparing for future pandemics: Automated intensive care electronic health record data extraction to accelerate clinical insights
details: L Lijović, HJ de Grooth, P Thoral, L Bos, Z Feng… - Journal of Intensive …, 2024
abstract: Background Manual data abstraction from electronic health records (EHRs) for research on intensive care patients is time-intensive and challenging, especially during high-pressure periods such as pandemics. Automated data extraction is a …
